name: Ba'astat
description:
GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/baastet-5

- About this project -

This game was created during Global Game Jam 2020. This jam theme was "Repair" and the duration is 48 hours.

- Summary -

Years after Cats have left earth for the new frontier, one individual finds herself plagued with an inexplicable longing. It returns to a drowning earth to answer the call of an old god. The player must navigate through a distant past to return a sacred object and restore the god to her former glory. Years after Cats have left earth for the new frontier, one individual finds herself plagued with an inexplicable longing. It returns to a drowning earth to answer the call of an old god. The player must navigate through a distant past to return a sacred object and restore the god to her former glory. 

- Controls -

Movement: WASD Attack: Q

- Credits :D -

Thank you everyone! Even tho the game was pretty eh overall,  the experience was invaluable and we had an awesome time!

Programmers:  Adrian, Shish, Haziq, Aloy, Calvert :D

Artists: Zane, Damin, Riggle :D

Special thanks to: Shank for helping out, and to everyone else i forgot to mention!! 

Let's make games together sometime again!!
